災害被害調査、各社連携の仕組みを…損保協会会長

03 Nov 2019, 10:32



日本損害保険協会の金杉恭三会長（１日、東京都渋谷区で）＝杉山正樹撮影

　日本損害保険協会の金杉恭三会長（あいおいニッセイ同和損害保険社長）は読売新聞のインタビューに応じ、台風や豪雨による大規模災害に備え、損保各社が連携して被害状況を調査する仕組みを作る考えを明らかにした。被災者への迅速な保険金の支払いにつなげる狙いだ。
　金杉氏は、近年相次ぐ大雨や台風などによる建物の被害を受け、「大規模災害が毎年発生するようになり、オール損保での対応が必要だ」と強調した。
　新たな仕組みでは、大規模災害の発生時、被災範囲や浸水の高さを調べるために小型無人機ドローンを使って撮影した写真や、人工衛星のデータを協会の加盟各社で共有し、効率化する。
　また、損保社員らが被災地に入って行う建物などの調査も、複数社が共同で実施できるよう検討する。損保各社はこれまで、地震保険の調査などでは連携してきたが、補償内容や約款が異なる火災保険では進んでいなかった。
　金杉氏は、「支払い手続きが早くなることは、顧客にとって重要だ。まずは写真データの共有化を呼びかけたい」と述べた。

Disaster damage investigation, collaboration between companies ... President of the Insurance Association

03 Nov 2019, 10:32



Shinzo Kanesugi, Chairman of the Japan General Insurance Association (1st, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo) = Photo taken by Masaki Sugiyama

In response to an interview with the Yomiuri Shimbun, Chairman Shinzo Kanesugi of the Japan General Insurance Association (President Aioi Nissay Dowa General Insurance Co., Ltd.) is thinking about creating a mechanism for non-life insurance companies to collaborate and investigate the damage situation in preparation for a large-scale disaster caused by a typhoon or heavy rain Revealed. The aim is to lead to prompt payment of insurance money to victims.
Mr. Kanesugi stressed that in recent years, buildings have been damaged by heavy rains and typhoons, and so large-scale disasters have occurred every year and all non-life insurance must be dealt with.
In the new system, when a large-scale disaster occurs, photos taken using a small drone drone and artificial satellite data are shared among the member companies of the association in order to investigate the extent of damage and the height of inundation. To do.
In addition, we will consider that multiple companies can jointly conduct surveys of buildings, etc. conducted by non-life employees into the affected areas. Until now, non-life insurance companies have cooperated in surveys of earthquake insurance, but they have not made progress in fire insurance with different compensation details and terms and conditions.
Mr. Kanesugi said, “It is important for customers to speed up the payment procedure. First, I want to call for sharing of photo data.”
